Articles.Content:
Howdy everyone. I bought this game 4 days ago and currently have 19 hours played. (I'm fully addicted)

So far, I've successfully landed on the Mun and Minmus, though unfortunately, the brave kerbals do not have enough fuel to return home.

Plans for a rescue mission are already underway, however I suspect they will result in even more stranded kerbals...

Looking forward to exploring the game further.
haah i think we have all been there. welcome to the forums buddy

After my first few crash landings I had three Kerbals stuck on the Mun, pretty close to each other. When I actually made my first successful landing, it was way too far away to get them, and I had to go floating around the Mun trying to get to them.

Well, when I finally did, not only did I run out of fuel, but I realized my ship only had ONE seat!

So I deleted the whole game and started over. I know, I know, where's the fun in that?

I did much better this time around, though.
